{"id":1111236599,"question_id":3231,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6 months, 1 week","timestamp":1701575845,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1111236599/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Coins to be Added","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimumAddedCoins(int[] coins, int target) {\n        \n        \n        int len = coins.length;\n        int[] dp = new int[target+1];\n        \n        List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        for(int c: coins){\n            list.add(c);\n        }\n        \n        int res = 0;\n        \n        for(int i=1; i<=target; i++){\n           coinChange(list, i);\n            \n            \n        }\n        \n        \n        return list.size()-coins.length;\n      \n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n    \n    \n     public int coinChange(List<Integer> coins, int amount) {\n        int len = coins.size();\n        int[] dp = new int[amount+1];\n        Arrays.fill(dp, Integer.MAX_VALUE);\n\n        dp[0] = 0;\n\n        for(int i=0; i<=amount; i++){\n            for(int coin : coins){\n                if(i-coin>=0 && dp[i-coin]!=Integer.MAX_VALUE)\n                    dp[i] = Math.min(dp[i], dp[i-coin]+1);\n            }\n        }\n         \n         if(dp[amount]==Integer.MAX_VALUE)\n             coins.add(amount);\n\n        return dp[amount]==Integer.MAX_VALUE? -1: dp[amount];\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-coins-to-be-added","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
